tool_description: Official Postal Ninja tracking API for developers
name: Postal Ninja
title: Postal Ninja

api_list.name: createTrack
api_list.description: Returns ID of newly created package (status=CREATED) or stored ID if this tracking number already exists (status=FOUND).

utterances.utterance: Track my package with tracking number LX123456789CN.
Can you add tracking for parcel number 9400111899223856921234 with USPS as the carrier?
Start tracking shipment RR987654321JP going to the United States.
Please create a tracking entry for package number CP123456789RU with Russian Post as the carrier and destination country Russia.
Add tracking for my order with code EE987654321KR.
Register tracking number 1234567890 with DHL as the carrier.
Track package LB123456789SG destined for Canada.
Create a tracking record for parcel number 1Z999AA10123456784 with UPS and destination country US.
Please track my shipment with code AB123456789DE.
Add tracking for package number RS123456789CN with China Post as the carrier and destination country Australia.

api_list.name: refreshTrack
api_list.description: Submits on-demand refresh request to tracking engine for package with given ID. Please note, that packages in ACTIVE list are auto-tracked regularly so you don't need to do this for such packages.

api_list.name: moveTrack
api_list.description: Moves package with given ID to ARCHIVED, TRASHED or back to ACTIVE list.
